tool_description: The Tokopedia API is a robust and versatile application programming interface provided by Tokopedia, one of Indonesia's leading e-commerce platforms. This API allows developers to seamlessly integrate Tokopedia's extensive range of e-commerce functionalities into their own applications. With secure and well-documented endpoints, the Tokopedia API empowers developers to create innovative and personalized shopping experiences while leveraging the platform's vast marketplace. Whether building mo...
name: Tokopedia
title: Tokopedia

api_list.name: Product Search
Product Discussion
Product Reviews

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description:
Valid value:
```
 create_time desc
 rating desc
 rating asc
```

api_list.name: Product Rating
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tokopedia7.p.rapidapi.com/product/rating/459906908"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tokopedia7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tokopedia7.p.rapidapi.com/product/rating/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tokopedia7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Product Detail
Shop Products

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
```
  /*
   * 2 = terbaru
   * 23 = paling sesuai`
   * 10 = harga tertinggi
   * 9 = harga terendah
   * 11 = ulasan terbanyak
   */
```
